author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Connect Says FY Adjusted Pre-Tax Profit For Continuing Operations To Be £42 Mln To £45 Mln​
text:
Jan 22 (Reuters) - Connect Group Plc:
* ‍TOTAL GROUP REVENUE FOR CONTINUING OPERATIONS OF £564.5M (FY2017: £584.9M) HAS DECREASED BY 3.5% YEAR TO DATE​
* ‍EXPECTS FULL YEAR ADJUSTED PROFIT BEFORE TAX FOR CONTINUING OPERATIONS TO BE IN RANGE OF £42M TO £45M​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
